argumentText:
ARGUMENT
f g

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | offval.1 | |- ( ph -> F Fn A ) |
| 2 |  | offval.2 | |- ( ph -> G Fn B ) |
| 3 |  | offval.3 | |- ( ph -> A e. V ) |
| 4 |  | offval.4 | |- ( ph -> B e. W ) |
| 5 |  | offval.5 | |- ( A i^i B ) = S |
| 6 |  | offval.6 | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> ( F ` x ) = C ) |
| 7 |  | offval.7 | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B ) -> ( G ` x ) = D ) |
| 8 |  | #P_fnex | |- ( ( F Fn A /\ A e. V ) -> F e. _V ) |
| 9 | 1, 3, 8 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> F e. _V ) |
| 10 |  | #P_fnex | |- ( ( G Fn B /\ B e. W ) -> G e. _V ) |
| 11 | 2, 4, 10 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> G e. _V ) |
| 12 |  | #P_dmeq | |- ( f = F -> dom f = dom F ) |
| 13 |  | #P_dmeq | |- ( g = G -> dom g = dom G ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_ineqan12d | |- ( ( f = F /\ g = G ) -> ( dom f i^i dom g ) = ( dom F i^i dom G ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_fveq1 | |- ( f = F -> ( f ` x ) = ( F ` x ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_fveq1 | |- ( g = G -> ( g ` x ) = ( G ` x ) ) |
| 17 | 15, 16 | #P_breqan12d | |- ( ( f = F /\ g = G ) -> ( ( f ` x ) R ( g ` x ) <-> ( F ` x ) R ( G ` x ) ) ) |
| 18 | 14, 17 | #P_raleqbidv | |- ( ( f = F /\ g = G ) -> ( A. x e. ( dom f i^i dom g ) ( f ` x ) R ( g ` x ) <-> A. x e. ( dom F i^i dom G ) ( F ` x ) R ( G ` x ) ) ) |
| 19 |  | #P_df-ofr | |- oR R = { <. f , g >. | A. x e. ( dom f i^i dom g ) ( f ` x ) R ( g ` x ) } |
| 20 | 18, 19 | #P_brabga | |- ( ( F e. _V /\ G e. _V ) -> ( F oR R G <-> A. x e. ( dom F i^i dom G ) ( F ` x ) R ( G ` x ) ) ) |
| 21 | 9, 11, 20 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( F oR R G <-> A. x e. ( dom F i^i dom G ) ( F ` x ) R ( G ` x ) ) ) |
| 22 |  | #P_fndm | |- ( F Fn A -> dom F = A ) |
| 23 | 1, 22 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> dom F = A ) |
| 24 |  | #P_fndm | |- ( G Fn B -> dom G = B ) |
| 25 | 2, 24 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> dom G = B ) |
| 26 | 23, 25 | #P_ineq12d | |- ( ph -> ( dom F i^i dom G ) = ( A i^i B ) ) |
| 27 | 26, 5 | #P_syl6eq | |- ( ph -> ( dom F i^i dom G ) = S ) |
| 28 | 27 | #P_raleqdv | |- ( ph -> ( A. x e. ( dom F i^i dom G ) ( F ` x ) R ( G ` x ) <-> A. x e. S ( F ` x ) R ( G ` x ) ) ) |
| 29 |  | #P_inss1 | |- ( A i^i B ) C_ A |
| 30 | 5, 29 | #P_eqsstr3i | |- S C_ A |
| 31 | 30 | #P_sseli | |- ( x e. S -> x e. A ) |
| 32 | 31, 6 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. S ) -> ( F ` x ) = C ) |
| 33 |  | #P_inss2 | |- ( A i^i B ) C_ B |
| 34 | 5, 33 | #P_eqsstr3i | |- S C_ B |
| 35 | 34 | #P_sseli | |- ( x e. S -> x e. B ) |
| 36 | 35, 7 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. S ) -> ( G ` x ) = D ) |
| 37 | 32, 36 | #P_breq12d | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. S ) -> ( ( F ` x ) R ( G ` x ) <-> C R D ) ) |
| 38 | 37 | #P_ralbidva | |- ( ph -> ( A. x e. S ( F ` x ) R ( G ` x ) <-> A. x e. S C R D ) ) |
| 39 | 21, 28, 38 | #P_3bitrd | |- ( ph -> ( F oR R G <-> A. x e. S C R D ) ) |
